SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: vidaXL.hr offers home delivery for standard and bulky products. The availability of delivery to parcel shops is mentioned in an FAQ but not confirmed. In-store pickup and parcel lockers are not available.
PRICING: Delivery is free for all products, with no minimum order value mentioned. Cash on delivery is an available payment method, but any potential surcharge is not specified.
PROVIDERS & TIMEFRAMES: The website does not specify which courier companies are used for delivery. Standard and express delivery timeframes are not provided.
RESTRICTIONS: The website has an FAQ regarding delivery to islands and remote areas, but the specific policy or any potential surcharges are not visible.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The key feature is free delivery on all items. The option for cash on delivery is also highlighted.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is very basic. While the 'free delivery' offer is prominent, critical details such as delivery partners, timeframes, and island delivery policies are not readily accessible. Information is hidden within an FAQ format, requiring users to click each question individually to find answers, which were not available in the provided data.
